altTitles.en: The Strongest Vampire Princess Who Found and Adopted the Baby Saint in the Forest: I'll Even Destroy a Country for My Daughter!

description.en:
Manga completed with 10 chapters and 2 bonus chapters.

The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today.The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?!After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption.Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection.One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath!The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means!A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!

altTitles.ja-ro: Mesh

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

altTitles.en: TBATE

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)

description.pt:
Um NEET é renascido em outro mundo com a promessa de um avida pacifica. Apesar de ter nascido na realeza, devido a sua magica parecer fraca, seus pais o abandonaram sem pensar em uma floresta para ser devorado por monstros. Contudo sua magia é desumanamente poderosa. O que ele devera fazer para obter a vida pacifica que ele tanto deseja?

Hikikomori (引き篭り) é um termo que significa literalmente isolado em casa, ele é usado para referir-se a pessoas que apresentam graves níveis de isolamento, normalmente são jovens entre 13 e 39 anos que muitas vezes são sustentados pelos pais ou trabalham online. NEET é basicamente a mesma coisa mas tem suas diferenças."
description.ru: Парень перерождается в другой мир, чтобы иметь обещанную мирную жизнь. Ребенком его бросают в лесу за низкий уровень магии, который не может быть измерен современными радарами. Что ему нужно сделать, чтобы достичь мирной жизни, которую он так желает?
description.es-la: Un chico renace en otro mundo para tener una vida pacífica. Un bebé nacido de poder y realeza, abandonado en el bosque por tener un poder que no puede ser comparado ni por los radares modernos (no, no esta ni cerca de sobrepasar los 9000). ¿Qué hara para obtener la vida pacífica que él tanto desea?"
description.pt-br:
Reencarnar em outro mundo com a promessa de um poder de "trapaça" é uma coisa... mas renascer como um bebê e então ser deixado para morrer depois que seus pais reais acham que você é impotente? Isso é outra coisa completamente diferente!

Agora, o recém-nascido Reinhart — ou Hart para seus novos amigos — deve encontrar seu caminho através de um mundo perigoso. Mas, felizmente, ele tem uma magia que está literalmente fora dos gráficos!

description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

A brand new girl-meets-girl story, woven together by two people with completely opposite “looks” and “personas”!

Cram school teacher Kataoka Aoi was born with a beautiful face. From an early age, she always garnered the affection of everyone around her, yet the countless dramas it caused made her desire a quiet, modest life instead.

One day, she (reluctantly) accepts the principal’s request to act in their school’s commercial. But it quickly goes viral, resulting in her becoming popular inside and outside of the cram school, drawing attention wherever she goes.

Amidst the attention, the well-known and quirky store clerk, Yamada, approaches her and then…

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en:
Alellia, who has had her engagement broken off, is past the marriageable age, and is known behind her back as the "domineering female supervisor". She spends her days performing her duties as the right hand woman of Marquess Istilia Wegmund, "the cold-hearted prime minister."

One day, while performing her duties, the Prime Minister asks her to marry him.

Rumor has it that the Prime Minister is in love with another woman.
Alellia accepts the engagement, believing that she is being asked to enter into a contractual marriage.

A newly-married life with the cold-hearted prime minister begins...!
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

description.en: Both my parents had only loved my sister and I had no place at home.  I lived my life believing that as long as I worked hard, I would someday be loved. One day, my sister received a royal order to marry a frontier count who was rumored to be ruthless. My father, who loved my sister, said to me, "You will marry into the frontier count's territory instead. But on the way, the carriage will be attacked by demons - you will die." As planned, I was attacked by monsters, but the one who rescued me was the ruthless Count of the Frontier, a beautiful man with bright red hair and sharp golden eyes...

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

description.en:
In a world where prehispanic cultures developed an steam powered industrial technology, a young redheaded girl — the huntress Metzli — is tracking an interesting bounty. Maybe this commission is bigger than she expects.

description.es-la:

The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!

description.en:
Chiyoko Hanamura, a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut, was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior, Sakine, approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask, as she handed Chiyoko a love letter.

"Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However, the sender was unknown.

For the sake of her adorable junior, and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity, Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)
description.ru:
Коллаб между автором тайтла Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун! и Warewareda

Тойфер Сяорон - вечный мечтатель, поступив в демоническую школу Бабирус, стремится вступить в состав Студенческого Совета, не ища легких путей, решив доказать свою полезность тем самым вынудив президента студ.совета Амели самой прийти вербовать его, но что то пошло не так... Хитростью заманенный в батор по захвату и контролю школы Сяорон пытается выжить и не умереть на безжалостных заданиях!

description.en:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

altTitles.en: Lupin III - World's Most Wanted
New Lupin III

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Lupin Sansei

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: ネズミのヒコーキ

altTitles.en: A Rat's Aeroplane

description.en:
More ratventures from Tamura.

---
Published in Bikkuri House November 1979.

Kina, a witch doctor living on Mount Walpurgis, hears a prophecy from a titmouse one day that she will be executed within six months and will meet three men who will share her fate. Determined to escape her destiny, she hides in the mountains, but soon finds herself swept away by one man and sent to the imperial palace, where court intrigue awaits her. Can she survive the palace's plots and escape her foretold fate?

altTitles.en: My Beloved Baby Sister
Raising My Little Sister Prettily
I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.th: คราวนี้ฉันจะเลี้ยงน้องเป็นอย่างดี

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

altTitles.en: Bullying back. The vengeance of 31.
Calendar of Vengeance
Payback to those that bullied me. This is the revenge of 31.

altTitles.ja: イジメカエシ。－復讐の３１-

description.en:
I was bullied by everyone, so in return I'm going to slaughter them all.  
Taking inspiration from the 31 days of the calendar, the uber popular girl group Calendrier was formed. Behind the bubbly appearance, in the shadows, there is one member that is bullied by the others on a daily basis. "If you can't smile, then neither will the fans."  
She is willing to do anything to regain the smile that was robbed by her group mates.  
  
With 30 members as her opponents, this is the story of the crazy number 31.

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

Workaholic Lee Dain, the dazzling actress and national goddess, never saw herself walking down the aisle. But when her grandfather falls ill, she grants his final wish by marrying her failed one-night-stand, Seo Dojun. Suddenly, her life spins into chaos: handling wacky in-laws, dodging a junior actor's advances, and dealing with her hubby's ex. Armed with her trademark confidence and sass, she's ready to take it all on. But will this rollercoaster marriage ever find its happily ever after?

altTitles.en: I Am a Daughter Loved by the Devil
I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil
The Devil's Beloved Daughter

altTitles.pt-br: Sou a amada filha do diabo

description.en:
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.ko:
"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)"

외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.

이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!

미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...

나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.

"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! (싸다 싸. 극비 정보에 단돈 천 골드!)"

저기, 세계 멸망을 막을 정보 사실래요?

_

"꽃이 예쁘게 피는 열대 섬 하나 사줄까?"
아벨이 이렇게 말하자마자,

"섬에 아무것도 없으면 심심할테니 큰 오빠가 놀이동산을 하나 지어줄까 해."
카이옌 오빠가 끼어들고,

"나는 인어를 부르는 아티팩트를 사주마. 그게 있으면 밤새 인어의 노래를 들으며 놀 수 있을 거다."
아빠는 한 술 더 뜬다!

나는 영리하고 똑똑한 속물 악마답게 공손히 입을 열었다.

"미끄럼틀은 순금으로 만들어 주세요."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.pt-br:
Mia cresceu sendo abusada por seu tio e tia. Um dia, em um sonho, ela vê um futuro que cai no esquema de seu tio e tia maternos, mata seu meio-irmão e causa uma grande guerra. Não pode acabar assim, o futuro está em minhas mãos! O primeiro passo nesse esforço é encontrar o pai que você conheceu em seu sonho!

“Dê-me uma carona!”

Em troca de vender as artimanhas do meu tio materno para o meu pai biológico, eu planejava sair com a pensão alimentícia e os custos de informação...
“Estou pensando em construir um parque de diversões.”

Quando o irmão mais velho, que se orgulha de nobre beleza, disse: “Você gostaria de me comprar uma ilha tropical com lindas flores?”

Meu segundo irmão não vai intervir, "Eu vou te comprar um artefato que chama uma sereia."

O pai mais bonito do mundo tem mais uma bebida! não! Todos os três são extremamente ruins para o dinheiro!!! A resposta diabólica do esnobe esperto e esperto é... “Faça o slide de ouro puro!”

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
Trapped in a Game That Flopped

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

description.en:
Washed up on the shores of a deserted island at the edge of the East Blue Sea, two men from different backgrounds unite in their shared thirst for adventure. One of them, Portgaz D. Ace, will follow in his infamous father’s footsteps as the fearless captain of a pirate crew. The other, Masked Deuce, becomes the reluctant first member of Ace’s Spade Pirates. Survival is not enough for these seafaring buccaneers, as together they seek treasure, excitement, and a route to the New World.

---
**Note**: Includes two oneshots part of the **One Piece Cover Comic Project** in which other manga authors recreate Eiichiro Oda's original One Piece chapters in their own style.

[One more oneshot](https://mangadex.org/title/7bd37661-c0b1-4166-87c1-7e633adb55ac) was drawn for this project by Komi Naoshi.
description.pt-br: A história do irmão do Luffy e filho do Rei dos Piratas, Portgas D. Ace, e foca no período logo após ele ter saído em sua aventura como pirata, antes de seu encontro com o Barba Branca.

ココクレ

altTitles.en: Kokokure

description.en: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: タイカの理性

altTitles.en: The Whys and Wherefores of Taika

description.en:
As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...?
As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"...
In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。
